movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.review: A gripping tale of hope and friendship set in the harsh environment of Shawshank prison.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.review: An epic crime saga exploring the themes of power, family, and loyalty in the world of organized crime.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.review: A non-linear narrative featuring interconnected stories of crime, redemption, and dark humor.

movies.title: Inception
movies.review: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller that explores the concept of dream infiltration and subconscious manipulation.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.review: A superhero masterpiece featuring the iconic rivalry between Batman and the Joker, exploring chaos and morality.
